title: Photograph, View of an altar in a side chapel in an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of an altar in a side chapel in an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Side chapel, set off by a wooden rail, foreground, and a screen with columns and open arches, right. Reredos of Gothic revival; blind arcade surmounted by five gablets with turrets and finials. The center one, largest, over a crucifix. Statue of the Virgin, left, on a pedestal.

Same church as 1961-83-8 & -9

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, View of an altar in a side chapel in an unidentified church, 1904–13; printed on sensitized paper; 1961-83-7
